events.message: I purchased a jacket last week but it doesn't fit and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's request has been identified as a refund inquiry related to a return due to sizing issues.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa M. who handles refund and return cases.
Hello, thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to help with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still has the tags attached?
Sure, the order number is 56789X. The jacket is new, I haven't worn it, and all the tags are intact.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket within 14 days. We will issue a full refund once we receive the item.
Thanks for explaining the process clearly. I will send the jacket back today and look forward to the refund.
We have received your jacket return and processed your refund to your original payment method successfully.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since no further issues were reported, we are closing your refund case. Thank you for your patience.
Please take a moment to complete a quick survey about your refund experience to help us improve our service.
